A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love star wars. I wanted this to succeed on every level. This movie was a great disappointment. Wrong on so many levels. Great start but became very boring and dull very quickly. Almost felt like a prequel movie in the middle with poor versions of Harry Potter and Battlestar Galactica thrown in. Also\, feminism has ruined star wars. Numerous plot holes and absurd misplaced humour. When the hype dies down\, prepare for the huge backlash. So sad.
